text: Auxilium Pallacanestro Torino history and statistics in FIBA Europe and Euroleague Basketball (company) competitions. ==European competitions== {| class="wikitable" width=100% style="text-align: center;" ! width=10%|Record ! width=10%|Round ! width=20%|Opponent club ! width=10%| ! width=10%| ! width=10%| ! width=10%| ! width=10%| |- |colspan=8|1975–76 FIBA Korać Cup 3rd–tier FIBA Korać Cup 1975/76 |- |rowspan=6|6–5 +1 draw |2nd round |align=left| Caen |54–79 a |90–60 h |- |rowspan=3|Top 16 |align=left| Hapoel Tel Aviv |91–67 h |78–96 a |- |align=left| FC Barcelona |75–74 a |74–69 h |- |align=left| Olympique Antibes |97–101 a |89–63 h |- |SF |align=left| Juventud Schweppes |83–107 a |79–54 h |- |15px F |align=left| Jugoplastika |colspan=5|84–97, March 16, Dvorana Gripe, Split 82–82, March 23, Palasport Parco Ruffini, Turin |- |colspan=8|1985–86 FIBA Korać Cup 3rd–tier FIBA Korać Cup 1985/86 |- |rowspan=5|8–2 |1st round |align=left| Çukurova Üniversitesi |93–86 a |114–74 h |- |2nd round |align=left| Spartak Pleven |96–90 a |101–88 h |- |rowspan=3|Top 16 |align=left| PAOK |92–100 a |97–82 h |- |align=left| Olympique Antibes |89–78 h |71–92 a |- |align=left| Zadar |114–105 a |85–68 h |- |colspan=8|1986–87 FIBA Korać Cup 3rd–tier FIBA Korać Cup 1986/87 |- |rowspan=4|4–4 |2nd round |align=left| Panionios |70–66 a |99–71 h |- |rowspan=3|Top 16 |align=left| Assubel Mariembourg |92–97 a |83–65 h |- |align=left| CAI Zaragoza |80–82 h |92–96 a |- |align=left| Partizan |90–101 a |91–90 h |} ==Record== Auxilium Pallacanestro Torino has overall, from 1975–76 (first participation) to 1986–87 (last participation): 18 wins against 11 defeats plus 1 draw in 30 games for all the European club competitions. * EuroLeague: – ** EuroCup 6-4 (10) *** FIBA Saporta Cup: – **** FIBA Korać Cup: 18–11 plus 1 draw (30) ==External links== *FIBA Europe *Euroleague *ULEB *Eurocup ==References== Category:Basketball teams in Piedmont Category:Sport in Turin
